effects: Arkansas Code § 20‑76‑201 sets forth the powers and duties of the Department of Human Services.  The department is charged with administering public assistance and child‑welfare activities, cooperating with public and private agencies, developing performance standards for welfare programs, conducting research and studies, and adopting and operating automated statewide benefit delivery and information systems【703909242863726†L73-L100】【703909242863726†L140-L151】.  These provisions authorize DHS to implement accountability measures and data systems to improve program management and compliance.
